## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                           | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `dismissible` | `dismissible` | Apply dismissible style on the drawer | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `modal`       | `modal`       | Set the drawer as a modal             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
